verses.verse: <S%G5620>Therefore,<s%> my brothers <S%G80><s%>dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%> and <S%G1973>longed<s%> for, my <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G4735>crown,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4739>stand<s%> fast in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> my dearly <S%G27>beloved.<s%>
I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G2136>Euodias,<s%> and <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G4941>Syntyche,<s%> that they be of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And I <S%G2065>entreat<s%> you <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G1103>true<s%> yoke <S%G4805>fellow,<s%> <S%G4815>help<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> women <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4866>labored<s%> with me in the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> with <S%G2815>Clement<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and with <S%G3062>other<s%> my fellow <S%G4904>laborers,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G104>always:<s%> and <S%G3825>again<s%> I <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G5463>Rejoice.<s%>
Let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1933>moderation<s%> be <S%G1097>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1451>at<s%> <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

Be <S%G3309>careful<s%> for <S%G3367>nothing;<s%> but in <S%G3956>every<s%> thing by <S%G4335>prayer<s%> and <S%G1162>supplication<s%> with <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G155>requests<s%> be <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5242>passes<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3563>understanding,<s%> shall <S%G5432>keep<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> and <S%G3540>minds<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3063>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are <S%G4586>honest,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are <S%G1342>just,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are <S%G4375>lovely,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things are of <S%G2163>good<s%> <S%G2163>report;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G703>virtue,<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G1868>praise,<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> on <S%G5023>these<s%> things.

<S%G5023>Those<s%> things, <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3129>learned,<s%> and <S%G3880>received,<s%> and <S%G191>heard,<s%> and <S%G1492>seen<s%> in me, <S%G4238>do:<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall be with you.

But I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3171>greatly,<s%> that <S%G2236>now<s%> <S%G4218>at<s%> the <S%G4218>last<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G5426>care<s%> of me has <S%G330>flourished<s%> <S%G330>again;<s%> <S%G1909>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> you were <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5426>careful,<s%> but you <S%G170>lacked<s%> <S%G170>opportunity.<s%>

Not that I <S%G3004>speak<s%> in <S%G2596>respect<s%> of <S%G5304>want:<s%> for I have <S%G3129>learned,<s%> in <S%G3588>whatever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> state I <S%G1510>am,<s%> therewith to be <S%G842>content.<s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> how to be <S%G5013>abased,<s%> and I <S%G1492>know<s%> how to <S%G4052>abound:<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3956><s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> things I am <S%G3453>instructed<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to be <S%G5526>full<s%> and to be <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> and to <S%G5302>suffer<s%> need.
I <S%G2480>can<s%> <S%G2480>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1743>strengthens<s%> me.
<S%G4133>Notwithstanding<s%> you have <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G4160>done,<s%> that you did <S%G4790>communicate<s%> with my <S%G2347>affliction.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> you <S%G5374>Philippians<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> that in the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1831>departed<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G2841>communicated<s%> with me as <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G1394>giving<s%> and <S%G3028>receiving,<s%> but you <S%G3441>only.<s%>
For <S%G2532>even<s%> in <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> you <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> and <S%G1364>again<s%> to my <S%G5532>necessity.<s%>
Not <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G1934>desire<s%> a <S%G1390>gift:<s%> but I <S%G1934>desire<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> that may <S%G4121>abound<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>account.<s%>

But I <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and <S%G4052>abound:<s%> I am <S%G4137>full,<s%> having <S%G1209>received<s%> of <S%G1891>Epaphroditus<s%> the things which were sent from you, an <S%G3744>odor<s%> of a <S%G2175>sweet<s%> <S%G2175>smell,<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G1184>acceptable,<s%> well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But my <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G4137>supply<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G4149>riches<s%> in <S%G1391>glory<s%> by <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and our <S%G3962>Father<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G40>saint<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> The <S%G80>brothers<s%> which are with me <S%G782>greet<s%> you.
<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you, <S%G3122>chiefly<s%> they that are of <S%G2541>Caesar's<s%> <S%G3614>household.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> To the Philippians written from Rome, by Epaphroditus.
